short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make one decision easier today by randomly selecting a Jira group member for daily scrums, retrospectives and other sessions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jira Jiggler allows teams using the Jira cloud to easily and randomly select a team member from an existing group, and jiggle between them.

If you're experiencing decision fatigue running one or more teams, use the jiggler to remove one more decision from your day, and make it super simple to get started.

Please leave a comment with any issues or to request support for non Jira cloud instances (I'm working on it!)
